description:
In our application ,we need to call this method several times .For each time ,it will retrieve all the output. 
It would be nice to return selecting range of output instead.
title: 'get console output' v3 API allows to fetch selecting range of output

comments.content:
In our application ,we need to call this method several times .For each time ,it will retrieve all the output. 
It would be nice to return selecting range of output instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mjia

comments.content: Note that you can specify the length of console output that you want returned through a length parameter. Is that sufficient or do you need a range as well?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0
